title: M.L.S. Cup and the Joy of the Open Field
description: A final in Los Angeles offers a welcome clash of styles, while a Copa Libertadores crown shows Brazilian teams may have cracked the code in that competition.
dc:creator: Rory Smith
media:credit: Kyle Ross/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: The Philadelphia Union, the best team in the East, will face Los Angeles F.C., the best in the West, in Saturdayâ€™s M.L.S. Cup final.
